law.catch_line: Before any license may be issued under this subtitle to an employer to engage in an activity in whic...
law.text:
Before any license may be issued under this subtitle to an employer to engage in an activity in which the employer may employ a covered employee, as defined in § 9-101 of the Labor and Employment Article, the employer shall file with the Administration:
a certificate of compliance with the Maryland Workers' Compensation Act; or
the number of a workers' compensation insurance policy or binder.
